text: <@UJG9WTEKG> are you willing to share the tech stack you used to create the :file_cabinet: save thread functionality? I'm in another Slack workspace that I think would love this.

text:
<!everyone> hey folks! weekend countdown is on, i hope you have some fun/relaxing plans to look forward to :sunglasses:
a few things for ya today:
• the Knotch team joined us for an AMA yesterday. thanks <@U02Q5J6H7NC> <@U03BMPTTVQU> and <@U03C99V6K5W> for answering questions on content strategy. it'll be posted on the blog soon, but <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C014P2BJLER/p1649955642790239|you can also check it out right here>. 
• NYC folks! we're doing a meetup. I hope to be there in person (working on childcare!) <https://www.eventbrite.com/e/superpaths-first-internal-link-nyc-meetup-tickets-317720790437|details and signup here> :statue_of_liberty::table_tennis_paddle_and_ball:  we also revived the old <#CTVJQSS0M|nyc> channel for all you tri-state folks (if any co's are interested in sponsoring this meetup, hit me up!)
okay, onto jobs!
---
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Superpath is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/278470-content-and-community-manager-superpath|Content & Community Manager> (this role is now remote! :earth_americas:)
• Perforce Software, Inc is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/320549-senior-marketing-writer-helix-alm-perforce-software-inc|Senior Marketing Writer> :zap:
• Massive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/320512-marketing-manager-communications-and-brand-massive|Marketing Manager, Communications and Brand> :zap:
• Gorgias is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/307905-editorsenior-editor-gorgias|Editor/Senior Editor> (:wave: <@U01G4M62C5B>) :tv: (now w/ video Q&A)
• Built Technologies is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/292167-content-writer-built-technologies|Content Writer>
• Lox Club is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/286919-brand-marketing-manager-lox-club|Brand Marketing Manager>
• Reylance AI is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243492-technical-marketing-content-developer-relyance-ai|Technical Marketing Content Developer>
• Reylance AI is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243493-privacy-marketing-content-developer-relyance-ai|Privacy Marketing Content Developer>
• Stoke is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/279609-senior-content-strategist-stoke|Senior Content Strategist>
• Ripple is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/279329-content-marketing-manager-ripplex-ripple|Content Marketing Manager>
• Craze is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/278419-social-media-manager-craze|Social Media Manager>
• Original9 Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/278353-content-writer-original9-media|Content Writer>
• Pitch is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/277924-head-of-content-marketing-remote-pitch|Head of Content Marketing (Remote)>
• Relyance AI is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243492-technical-marketing-content-developer-relyance-ai|Technical Marketing Content Developer> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243493-privacy-marketing-content-developer-relyance-ai|Privacy Marketing Content Developer>
• Paystone is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/266652-inbound-marketing-manager-remote-canada-paystone|Inbound Marketing Manager>
• Close is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/255485-head-of-content-100-remote-close|Head of Content>
• Clari is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/253340-content-marketing-manager-clari|Content Marketing Manager>
• Spekit is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/250765-director-of-content-marketing-spekit|Director of Content Marketing>
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229245-senior-manager-of-customer-experience-verblio|Senior Manager of Customer Experience>️ and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219408-content-marketing-manager-verblio|Content Marketing Manager> :tv: (:wave: <@U02EL2NBYGL>)
---
:writing_hand: *freelance projects:*
• Jolly SEO is hiring <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/325989-writers-to-ghost-journalist-outreach-jolly-seo|Writers to Ghost Journalist Outreach> :zap:️
• Ignite My Site is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/295652-b2b-saas-freelance-writer-ignite-my-site|B2B SaaS Freelance Writer>
• Sacra is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/295283-freelance-editor-sacra|freelance editor>
• Ripple is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/279331-senior-content-marketing-manager-contract-ripple|Senior Content Marketing Manager (Contract)> (:wave: <@U038DA137EV>)
---
:female-technologist: *and more from the job board:*
---
• Canva is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/320872-content-marketing-manager-b2b-canva|Content Marketing Manager B2B> :zap:
• Rainforest QA is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/295192-senior-content-marketing-manager-rainforest-qa|Senior Content Marketing Manager> ️
• Original9 Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/291747-senior-editor-original9-media|Senior Editor>
• Visme is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/291665-content-marketing-manager-visme|Content Marketing Manager>
• Great Question is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/291354-content-manager-great-question|Content Manager>
• Code Climate is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/266650-content-marketing-associate-code-climate|Content Marketing Associate>
• Code Climate is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/263720-content-writer-code-climate|Content Writer>
• AutoLeap is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/266375-content-marketing-manager-remote-autoleap|Content Marketing Manager> (Remote)
• Three Ships is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/255476-editor-three-ships|Editor>
• Clearbit is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/253641-senior-content-marketing-manager-clearbit|Senior Content Marketing Manager>
• Rebuy, Inc. is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/249483-content-marketer-rebuy-inc|Content Marketer>
• Bolster is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/249374-director-of-marketing-bolster|Director of Marketing> ($100-120k)
• CopyAI is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/244116-seo-marketing-manager-copyai|SEO Marketing Manager>️
have a great weekend!
:v: jimmy
